alert.note: Alert for Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 27 at 3:31PM MDT until October 28 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 14 inches with the heaviest accumulations above 10000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Embedded thunderstorms this afternoon could cause intense snowfall rates up to around 2 inches per hour which could cause rapidly deteriorating travel conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft
